description:
A ghost raises a child. A man freezes in the snow while he waits for his love.  A fox plays tricks.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kosodate Yuurei / Omanzakura / Osono Gitsune to Kajiya
The Ghost Who Raised a Child / Oman Cherry Blossoms / The Osono Fox and the Blacksmith
子育て幽霊 / おまん桜 / おその狐と鍛冶屋
